end_message: Interview mein hissa lene ka shukriya!
1: Aap ka gender kya hai? Mard ya aurat
3: Aap ko Rio biscuit dekhne mein kaisa laga? 1 say 7 kay scale par batayein, jahan 1 ka matlab hai 'bilkul bhi pasand nahi aya' aur 7 ka matlab hai 'bohat pasand aya'.
4: Baraye meherbani batayein kay aap ko Rio ka zaiqa kis had tak pasand aya? 1 say 7 kay scale par jahan 1 ka matlab hai bilkul bhi pasand nahi aya aur 7 ka matlab hai bohat pasand aya.
5: Majmooi tor par aap ko Rio kaisa laga? 1 say 9 kay scale par batayein, jahan 1 ka matlab hai 'bilkul bhi pasand nahi aya' aur 9 ka matlab hai 'bohat pasand aya'.
6: Aap kay jawab say lagta hai aap ko Rio nahi pasand aya. Baraye meherbani tafseel say batayein kyun pasand nahi aya?
7:
Agar Rio biscuit kay 2 biscuit ka pack 30 rupay mein dastyab ho, to kya aap isay khareedein gay?
 1 - jee han khareedon ga,
 2 - nahi khareedon ga,
 3 - shayad ya kuch keh nahi sakta.
8: Kya aap Rio kay baray mein kuch aur kehna chahein gay ya koi mashwara dena chahein gay?
